about_the_game:
This soundtrack is provided free of charge to game purchasers.
It contains standard-quality MP3 and high-quality Flac data.
The music data is downloaded in the Soundtrack folder of the game installation folder.

Track Listing

01_Heaven's prison 3:01

02_Knight of gears 2:19

name: Demon Sword: Incubus Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 64bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R9 285 series card or higher
  • Storage: 660 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound Chip

short_description: This soundtrack is provided free of charge to game purchasers. It contains standard-quality MP3 and high-quality Flac data. The music data is downloaded in the Soundtrack folder of the game installation folder.
supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
